column1: henry a. mc. caw| age 93 years. preceded in death by wife jane
column2: son james. survived by daughters jane (doug) killion, cindy (don) higbee
column9: special friend marguerite utiger. visitation tuesday, june 23rd, 5:00 - 7:00 p. m. at the funeral home. funeral service wednesday, june 24th, 1:00 p. m. bethany funeral home chapel. military honors by ralston american legion post 373 honor guard. private interment graceland park cemetery. memorials will be directed by the family.
